descriptor.name: Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea | Pure & Natural | Rich In Anti-Diabetic Property | Improves Insulin Sensitivity & Cholesterol Level | Turmeric, Tamarind, Karela, Tulsi, Cinnamon, Gurmar Tin (100g).15 Day Pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Controlling diabetes can be tricky. You need to give up on a lot of things especially tea and coffee because of its high caffeine content.

But not anymore! Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is perfect solution for you that balances blood sugar level with utmost care. Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is a blend of Garcinia, Cinnamon, Ginger, Lemongrass, Turmeric, Green tea.

Well Well! Well! With Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea you don’t need to compromise with the taste. It tastes way better than most of the green teas available in the market.

However, for best results, you need to drink Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea 2 to 3 times a day with your regular medications for at least three months.
descriptor.long_desc:
Controlling diabetes can be tricky. You need to give up on a lot of things especially tea and coffee because of its high caffeine content.

But not anymore! Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is perfect solution for you that balances blood sugar level with utmost care. Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is a blend of Garcinia, Cinnamon, Ginger, Lemongrass, Turmeric, Green tea.

Well Well! Well! With Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea you don’t need to compromise with the taste. It tastes way better than most of the green teas available in the market.

However, for best results, you need to drink Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea 2 to 3 times a day with your regular medications for at least three months.

Balancing Wellness: Freshville Anti-Diabetic Tea

Introduction:

In the pursuit of managing diabetes naturally, Freshville presents its Anti-Diabetic Tea—a harmonious blend of botanical wonders crafted to support individuals on their journey to balanced well-being. This tea combines the therapeutic properties of Turmeric, Tamarind, Karela, Tulsi, Cinnamon, and Gurmar to create a refreshing infusion designed to complement a holistic approach to diabetes management.

Key Ingredients:

Turmeric: Renowned for its active compound curcumin, turmeric has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties that may support overall health, including managing diabetes-related inflammation.

Tamarind: Tamarind contains compounds that may help manage blood sugar levels, making it a valuable addition to an anti-diabetic blend.

Karela (Bitter Melon): Karela is known for its potential blood sugar-lowering effects and may contribute to improved insulin sensitivity.

Tulsi (Holy Basil):Tulsi is revered for its adaptogenic and anti-inflammatory properties, potentially assisting the body in managing stress and inflammation associated with diabetes.

Cinnamon: Cinnamon is believed to have insulin-sensitizing effects, supporting better blood sugar control and metabolic health.

Gurmar (Gymnema Sylvestre): Gurmar is known as the "sugar destroyer" and is traditionally used to help reduce sugar absorption in the intestines, potentially aiding in blood sugar management.

How to Incorporate Freshville Anti-Diabetic Tea into Your Routine:

Brewing a cup of Freshville Anti-Diabetic Tea is a simple yet impactful addition to your daily routine. Follow the provided brewing instructions, allowing the blend to infuse into a cup of soothing vitality. Incorporate this tea into your daily habits to support your holistic approach to managing diabetes.

Important Considerations:

As with any natural remedy, individual responses may vary. It's crucial to consult with healthcare professionals, especially if you are on medication or have specific health concerns related to diabetes.

Conclusion:

Freshville Anti-Diabetic Tea is a testament to the power of nature in promoting balanced wellness. Elevate your diabetes management journey with the carefully selected blend of herbs that work together to support your health. Embrace the daily ritual of Freshville Anti-Diabetic Tea and experience the potential benefits of these natural ingredients on your path to overall well-being.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from type 2 diabetes. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

Features

Natural: Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your blood sugar levels.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness.

Herbal Blend: The herbal blend of Turmeric, Tamarind, Karela, Tulsi, Cinnamon, and Gurmar

Improved Blood Sugar Levels: This all-natural tea for diabetes helps maintain normal blood sugar levels.

Specifications:

100% natural ingredients

Scientifically tested

Caffeine-free

Good taste

How to prepare Freshville Anti Diabetic Tea with tea leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer.

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference).

Step 6: Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.

descriptor.short_desc:
Introducing Freshville Belly Fit Tea: A Harmony of Nature's Best

In a world bustling with chaotic lifestyles and endless responsibilities, finding moments of tranquility and rejuvenation becomes imperative. Freshville Belly Fit Tea emerges as a beacon of wellness, offering a unique blend of nature's finest ingredients meticulously crafted to harmonize body, mind, and spirit. Each sip is a journey through a symphony of flavors and a cascade of healthful benefits.

The Art of Fusion: A Symphony of Ingredients

At the heart of Freshville Belly Fit Tea lies its unparalleled blend of ingredients, carefully selected and harmoniously combined to create a potion of wellness.

Garcinia Cambogia: Known for its weight management properties, Garcinia Cambogia infuses the tea with a tangy sweetness while aiding in appetite control and metabolism regulation.

Cinnamon: With its warm and comforting aroma, cinnamon not only adds depth to the flavor profile but also boasts antioxidant properties, promoting overall wellbeing.

Ginger: Revered for centuries for its therapeutic properties, ginger lends a spicy kick to the blend while aiding in digestion and providing relief from nausea and inflammation.

Lemongrass: Offering a citrusy freshness, lemongrass uplifts the senses and aids in detoxification, promoting clear skin and improved digestion.

Turmeric: The golden spice of wellness, turmeric enriches the tea with its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, supporting joint health and boosting immunity.

Senna Leaf: Gentle yet effective, senna leaf gently stimulates bowel movements, aiding in natural detoxification and promoting digestive regularity.

Green Tea: A staple in traditional wellness practices, green tea infuses the blend with its earthy notes and abundant antioxidants, promoting heart health and mental clarity.

Experience the Journey: Benefits Beyond Measure

Indulging in a cup of Freshville Belly Fit Tea transcends mere refreshment; it's an experience that nourishes the body, uplifts the spirit, and invigorates the mind.

Weight Management: The synergistic blend of Garcinia Cambogia, green tea, and senna leaf supports healthy weight management by boosting metabolism, curbing cravings, and promoting natural detoxification.

Digestive Harmony: Ginger, lemongrass, and senna leaf combine forces to soothe the digestive system, alleviating bloating, gas, and discomfort, while promoting regularity and gut health.

Radiant Skin: Lemongrass and turmeric work wonders for the skin, purifying it from within, reducing inflammation, and imparting a healthy glow that radiates from the inside out.

Vitality and Immunity: With its antioxidant-rich profile, including cinnamon, turmeric, and green tea, Freshville Belly Fit Tea fortifies the body's defenses, supporting immunity and vitality.

Mental Clarity: Green tea, renowned for its cognitive benefits, enhances mental clarity and focus, helping you tackle daily challenges with renewed vigor and acuity.

Stress Relief: The ritual of savoring a cup of Freshville Belly Fit Tea offers a moment of respite in a busy day, allowing you to unwind, relax, and reconnect with yourself amidst the chaos.

Embrace Wellness: The Freshville Way

Beyond its tangible benefits, Freshville Belly Fit Tea embodies a holistic approach to wellness, celebrating the interconnectedness of body, mind, and soul. With every sip, you embark on a journey of self-care, nurturing yourself from the inside out and embracing a lifestyle that prioritizes balance, vitality, and joy.

The Freshville Promise: Quality You Can Trust, Benefits You Can Feel

Crafted with the utmost care and commitment to quality, Freshville Belly Fit Tea is a testament to our dedication to your wellness journey. From sourcing premium ingredients to ensuring sustainable practices, we uphold the highest standards to deliver a product that not only delights the palate but also nourishes the body and uplifts the spirit.

As you embrace the transformative power of Freshville Belly Fit Tea, you become part of a vibrant community united by a shared vision of holistic wellness. Together, we embark on a journey of self-discovery, empowerment, and vitality, celebrating each moment as an opportunity to thrive and flourish.

Welcome to the Freshville family, where every cup is a celebration of wellness and a toast to the vibrant journey ahead.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Slimming Green Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from weight management. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Slimming Green Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

Features

Natural: Freshville Belly Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your health along with managing the weight.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness. 

Herbal Blend: The herbal blend of Garcinia, Cinnamon, Ginger, Lemongrass, Turmeric, Green tea, and Senna leaf.

Weight loss: When used in combination with physical activity and healthy eating habits, it helps you with effective weight loss.

Specifications:

- 100% natural ingredients 

- Scientifically tested

- Good taste

How to prepare Freshville Slimming Green Tea with tea leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer. 

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference). 

Step 6:  Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.

descriptor.short_desc:
Chamomile tea is a popular herbal infusion made from the dried flowers of the chamomile plant, typically from two main varieties: German chamomile (Matricaria chamomilla) and Roman chamomile (Chamaemelum nobile). It is well-known for its soothing and calming properties, making it a favored choice for relaxation and improving sleep. Here's everything you need to know about the content, preparation, preservation, packaging, taste, and usage of chamomile tea:

Chamomile tea contains various bioactive compounds, including flavonoids, sesquiterpenes, and other antioxidants. It is also caffeine-free, making it suitable for individuals sensitive to caffeine or looking for a caffeine-free alternative.

Features

Natural: Freshville Green Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your health.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness.

Herbal Blend: It is a herbal blend of notes of Green Tea.

Revitalize Your Body with Freshville Detox Herbal Tea - A Symphony of Cleansing Botanicals

Introduction:

Embark on a journey of rejuvenation with Freshville Detox Herbal Tea, a thoughtfully curated blend designed to support your body's natural detoxification process. Harnessing the power of nature, this tea combines Moringa, Peppermint, Lemongrass, Hibiscus, Cardamom, Cinnamon, and Green Tea to create a harmonious infusion aimed at cleansing and revitalizing your system.

Key Ingredients:

Moringa: Known as the "drumstick tree," Moringa is rich in antioxidants and essential nutrients. It may contribute to detoxification by promoting liver health and aiding in the removal of toxins.

Peppermint: Peppermint's refreshing properties extend beyond flavour. It has been traditionally used to support digestion and may contribute to the soothing of the digestive tract during detoxification.

Lemongrass: Lemongrass is aromatic and contains compounds that may support liver function, a vital organ in the detox process.

Hibiscus: Hibiscus is prized for its vibrant colour and is believed to have properties that support kidney health, playing a role in eliminating waste from the body.

Cardamom: Adding a touch of warmth, cardamom is known for its digestive benefits and may contribute to the overall efficacy of the detoxification process.

Cinnamon: With its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, cinnamon may aid in reducing oxidative stress and inflammation during detoxification.

Green Tea: Green tea is a powerhouse of antioxidants and catechins that may support the body's natural detox pathways and contribute to overall well-being.

How to Enjoy Freshville Detox Herbal Tea:
Brewing a cup of Freshville Detox Herbal Tea is a simple yet delightful ritual. Follow the brewing instructions, allowing the aromatic blend to infuse into a cup of serenity. Make it part of your daily routine to experience this herbal infusion's potential benefits fully.

Important Considerations:

As with any detox product, individual responses may vary. It's essential to listen to your body and adopt a balanced approach to detoxification.

If you have pre-existing health conditions or are taking medications, it's advisable to consult with healthcare professionals before incorporating any new herbal product into your routine.

Conclusion:
Freshville Detox Herbal Tea invites you to embrace the cleansing power of nature. This meticulously crafted blend of botanicals tantalizes your taste buds and supports your body's natural detoxification processes. Elevate your daily routine with the revitalizing essence of Freshville Detox Herbal Tea and embark on a path to holistic well-being.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Detox Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from health issues. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Detox Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

Features

Natural: Freshville Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your health.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness. 

Herbal Blend: It is the herbal blend of various herbs.

Specifications:

- 100% natural ingredients 

- Scientifically tested

- Good taste

How to prepare Freshville Detox Tea with tea leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer.

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference).

Step 6: Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.

Revitalize Your Body with Freshville Detox Herbal Tea - A Symphony of Cleansing Botanicals

Introduction:

Embark on a journey of rejuvenation with Freshville Detox Herbal Tea, a thoughtfully curated blend designed to support your body's natural detoxification process. Harnessing the power of nature, this tea combines Moringa, Peppermint, Lemongrass, Hibiscus, Cardamom, Cinnamon, and Green Tea to create a harmonious infusion aimed at cleansing and revitalizing your system.

Key Ingredients:

Moringa: Known as the "drumstick tree," Moringa is rich in antioxidants and essential nutrients. It may contribute to detoxification by promoting liver health and aiding in the removal of toxins.

Peppermint: Peppermint's refreshing properties extend beyond flavour. It has been traditionally used to support digestion and may contribute to the soothing of the digestive tract during detoxification.

Lemongrass: Lemongrass is aromatic and contains compounds that may support liver function, a vital organ in the detox process.

Hibiscus: Hibiscus is prized for its vibrant colour and is believed to have properties that support kidney health, playing a role in eliminating waste from the body.

Cardamom: Adding a touch of warmth, cardamom is known for its digestive benefits and may contribute to the overall efficacy of the detoxification process.

Cinnamon: With its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, cinnamon may aid in reducing oxidative stress and inflammation during detoxification.

Green Tea: Green tea is a powerhouse of antioxidants and catechins that may support the body's natural detox pathways and contribute to overall well-being.

How to Enjoy Freshville Detox Herbal Tea:
Brewing a cup of Freshville Detox Herbal Tea is a simple yet delightful ritual. Follow the brewing instructions, allowing the aromatic blend to infuse into a cup of serenity. Make it part of your daily routine to experience this herbal infusion's potential benefits fully.

Important Considerations:

As with any detox product, individual responses may vary. It's essential to listen to your body and adopt a balanced approach to detoxification.

If you have pre-existing health conditions or are taking medications, it's advisable to consult with healthcare professionals before incorporating any new herbal product into your routine.

Conclusion:
Freshville Detox Herbal Tea invites you to embrace the cleansing power of nature. This meticulously crafted blend of botanicals tantalizes your taste buds and supports your body's natural detoxification processes. Elevate your daily routine with the revitalizing essence of Freshville Detox Herbal Tea and embark on a path to holistic well-being.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Detox Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from health issues. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Detox Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

Features

Natural: Freshville Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your health.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness. 

Herbal Blend: It is the herbal blend of various herbs.

Specifications:

- 100% natural ingredients 

- Scientifically tested

- Good taste

How to prepare Freshville Detox Tea with tea leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer.

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference).

Step 6: Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.

Keeping this idea in mind, we have curated the Freshville Digestion Tea.

All these ingredients take care of your stomach in the healthier way possible, keeping you away from digestive problems like constipation, indigestion, aids metabolism, and cleanses the body.

descriptor.short_desc:
Drinking green tea daily has a lot of health benefits.

But, drinking green tea is like drinking cucumber froth for you?

We understand this pain and that is why we have come up with Freshville Green Tea that not only purifes your body and eliminate the harmful effects of free radicals with exceptional taste.

In Freshville Green Tea, the fresh and tender green tea leaves. Within 4 hours of plucking, these green teas leaves are converted into powder. You will be glad to know that we have retained the benefits of the green leaves as there is no drying or heating involved.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Green Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from health issues. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Green Tea twice a day for three months for the best results.

descriptor.name: Freshville Hibiscus Tea | Pure & Natural | Tea for Weight Loss & Glowing Skin | Immunity Booster | High in antioxidents | Dried Hibiscus Flowers (100g).1 Month Pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Hibiscus tea, also known as "roselle tea" or "sour tea," is a popular herbal tea made from the dried calyces (the outer portion of the flower) of the hibiscus plant (Hibiscus sabdariffa). It is known for its vibrant red color, tart flavor, and numerous health benefits. Here's everything you need to know about the content, preparation, preservation, packaging, taste, and usage of hibiscus tea:

Hibiscus tea contains various compounds, including vitamin C, antioxidants (such as flavonoids and anthocyanins), and organic acids (such as citric acid, malic acid, and tartaric acid). It is caffeine-free, making it a suitable option for those avoiding caffeine or looking for a caffeine-free beverage.

Taste of Hibiscus Tea:

Hibiscus tea has a tangy and tart flavor profile, often described as refreshing and somewhat similar to cranberry or sour cherry. Some people may find it a bit tart, so you can adjust the strength and sweetness to suit your taste preferences. Many enjoy it hot, but it can also be served iced for a refreshing summer beverage.

Our Immune System protects us from diseases and infections. A person with low immunity who is prone to diseases. He/she can catch infection readily.

If you don’t want this to happen to yourselves, then you must try out our Freshville Immunity Booster Tea. This tea is made of traditional healing herbs (Turmeric, Cinnamon, Ginger, Clove, Ashwagandha, Mintfennel, Moringa, Tulsi ,Giloy, Amla, and Green Tea) to help the body build a strong immune system.

However, it's not a substitute for a healthy lifestyle but very effective when paired with it.

Fortify Your Well-being with Freshville Immunity Tea - A Herbal Symphony for Resilience

Introduction:

In the pursuit of robust health and well-being, Freshville presents its Immunity Tea—a potent blend of nature's finest ingredients designed to fortify your body's defences. With a harmonious infusion of Turmeric, Cinnamon, Ginger, Clove, Ashwagandha, Mint, Fennel, Moringa, Tulsi, Giloy, Amla, and Green Tea, this tea is crafted to nurture and strengthen your immune system.

Key Ingredients:

Turmeric: Renowned for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, turmeric contains curcumin, which may contribute to a strengthened immune response.

Cinnamon: With its warming properties, cinnamon adds a delightful flavour and contains antioxidants that may support overall immune health.

Ginger: Ginger is celebrated for its immune-boosting properties, which are known to combat inflammation and support respiratory health.

Clove: Clove is rich in antioxidants and may have antimicrobial properties, potentially contributing to immune system support.

Ashwagandha: An adaptogenic herb, Ashwagandha is believed to modulate the immune response, helping the body adapt to stressors and supporting overall well-being.

Mint and Fennel: Mint and Fennel provide a refreshing touch, offering digestive support and contributing to a healthy gut closely linked to immune function.

Moringa: Packed with vitamins and minerals, Moringa may contribute to overall health, providing a nutritional boost to support the immune system.

Tulsi: Known as Holy Basil, Tulsi is revered for its immune-enhancing properties and adaptogenic qualities, helping the body adapt to stress.

Giloy: A traditional Ayurvedic herb, Giloy is believed to have immune-boosting properties, supporting the body's defence mechanisms.

Amla: Amla, or Indian Gooseberry, is rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, known to strengthen the immune system.

Green Tea: Green tea is packed with antioxidants and catechins, promoting overall health and contributing to immune support.
How to Incorporate Freshville Immunity Tea into Your Routine:
Brewing a cup of Freshville Immunity Tea is a simple yet meaningful ritual. Follow the provided brewing instructions, allowing the herbs' robust flavours and beneficial properties to infuse into your cup. Make it a part of your daily routine to bolster your immune system.

Important Considerations:

As with any health product, individual responses may vary. It's advisable to listen to your body and consult with healthcare professionals, especially if you have underlying health conditions or are taking medications.

Conclusion: 

Freshville Immunity Tea is your ally in the journey towards a resilient and fortified immune system. Elevate your well-being with the power of natural ingredients that work in harmony to support your body's defences. Embrace the daily ritual of Freshville Immunity Tea and nurture your health with the richness of nature.

Features

Natural: Freshville Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your immune system.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness.

Herbal Blend: It is the herbal blend of Turmeric, Cinnamon, Ginger, Clove, Ashwagandha, Mintfennel, Moringa, Tulsi, Giloy, Amla, and Green Tea.

High Immunity: This all-natural tea helps maintain normal immune system function.

Specifications:

- 100% natural ingredients

- Scientifically tested

- Good taste

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer.

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

descriptor.short_desc:

Freshville Lemongrass Tea contains the inflammation-fighting compounds swertia japonica, isoorientin, and chlorogenic acid that are known to relieve anxiety, lowers cholesterol, prevents infection, boosts oral health and relieves pain.

You can enjoy all these benefits by drinking the Freshville Lemongrass Tea twice a day for at least two to three months.

Are you in search of a tea that can aid lungs detoxification?

Freshville Lungs Detox Tea can be the product that can end your search. Freshville Lungs Detox Tea is a perfect blend of traditional herbs that helps clear a nasal passage for improved airflow into the lungs and purifies them at the same time.

Freshville Lungs Detox Tea includes the goodness of Green tea, Moringa, Rose petals, Peppermint, Lemongrass, Hibiscus, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Mulethi, Tulsi, Fenugreek, Ginger, Thyme, and Fennel.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Lungs Detox Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from lungs toxicity. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Lungs Detox Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

descriptor.short_desc:
Fertility is a precious aspect of women's health, embodying the potential for new life and the continuation of family lineage. While fertility can be influenced by various factors, including genetics, lifestyle, and environmental factors, nurturing reproductive wellness through natural means can enhance the chances of conception.
 Freshville Ova Care Tea is a herbal infusion carefully curated with a blend of time-honored ingredients, each chosen for its unique ability to support female fertility. In this comprehensive guide, we delve into the benefits of the key ingredients found in Freshville Ova Care Tea and how they contribute to women's reproductive health and fertility.

Cinnamon: 1.Cinnamon is a warming spice prized for its numerous health benefits, including its ability to regulate blood sugar levels and improve insulin sensitivity. 2.It helps balance hormones by reducing insulin resistance, which is beneficial for women with polycystic ovary syndrome  (PCOS), a common cause of infertility. 3.Cinnamon also has antioxidant properties, protecting the ovaries from oxidative stress and supporting overall reproductive function.

Ginger:

Discovering the Power of Freshville PCOS PCOD Herbal Tea

Introduction:
Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) and Polycystic Ovarian Disorder (PCOD) are intricate hormonal conditions that affect many individuals, particularly women. In pursuing holistic well-being, herbal teas have become a beacon of hope. Freshville introduces a unique blend designed specifically for those navigating the challenges of PCOS and PCOD, featuring a symphony of natural ingredients: Ginger, Fenugreek, Spearmint, Cinnamon, Fennel, Tulsi, Lodhra, Ashoka, and Green Tea.

Key Ingredients:

Ginger:

Renowned for its anti-inflammatory properties, ginger may contribute to easing inflammation associated with PCOS. Its digestive benefits can also provide relief from bloating.

Fenugreek:

A potential ally in managing insulin sensitivity, fenugreek may play a crucial role in regulating blood sugar levels, a significant concern for individuals with PCOS.

Spearmint:

Spearmint is believed to have hormonal balancing properties, potentially aiding in reducing elevated androgen levels, a common feature of PCOS.

Cinnamon:

With anti-inflammatory and insulin-sensitizing properties, cinnamon may contribute to better blood sugar control, addressing one of the core concerns in PCOS.

Fennel:

Fennel's natural properties may support digestion and alleviate symptoms such as bloating, which can be expected in individuals with PCOS.

Tulsi (Holy Basil):

Known for its adaptogenic and stress-relieving properties, Tulsi may help manage stress, a factor that can exacerbate PCOS symptoms.

Lodhra:

Lodhra is traditionally used in Ayurveda and is believed to have properties that may support hormonal balance and reproductive health.

Ashoka:

Ashoka, another Ayurvedic herb, has potential benefits for women's reproductive health and may contribute to a sense of well-being.

Green Tea:

Rich in antioxidants, green tea supports overall health and may aid in weight management and contribute to metabolic health.

descriptor.short_desc:
Want to get rid of your stubborn poky face acne and pimples?

Freshville Skincare Tea can be the easiest way possible that will help you treat your skin problems in the natural way. Freshville Skin Care Tea is a mix of turmeric, cumin, lavender, rose petals, jasmine, moringa, and green tea.

All these ingredients have been combined in the right proportions as advised by Ayurveda to rejuvenate your skin. With this tea, you can fight premature aging, purify your blood, and boost immune function.

Recommended Daily Dose: Freshville Skincare Green Tea is a herbal tea designed for individuals suffering from skin problems. As different individuals have different levels of concerns, the effect of our tea may vary for them. However, our nutritionists advise drinking Freshville Skincare Green Tea twice a day for three months for best results.

Natural: Freshville Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to take care of your skin.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness.

Herbal Blend: The herbal blend of turmeric, cumin, lavender, rose petals, jasmine, moringa, and green tea.

Healthy Skin: This all-natural tea for skin helps maintain healthy and glowing skin.

descriptor.name: Freshville Women Fertility Tea | Pure & Natural | Helps With Hormonal Balance & Improves Fertility | Fennel, Nettle, Cinnamon, Ginger, Tulsi, Fenugreek, Spearmint, Shatavari, Moringa Tin (50gm).15 Day Pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Being a women is not easy! Women need to deal with a lot especially when it comes to their fertility.

Freshville women fertility tea is a delicious blend of traditional herbs that help women who face conception issues. One out of four couples have issues conceiving naturally. And there are many reasons for it: age, stress, and certain medications can all affect fertility.

Freshville was designed exclusively for women looking to get pregnant. It is a caffeine-free herbal infusion that helps regulate female cycles, Freshville women provide daily fertility care during preconception, pregnancy and postpartum.

The Problem with Sugar:

Excessive sugar consumption has been linked to a host of health issues, including obesity, diabetes, heart disease, and more. Unfortunately, many popular beverages today are loaded with added sugars, contributing to our daily intake without providing nutritional benefits. This overconsumption of sugar not only leads to weight gain but also wreaks havoc on our overall health and well-being.

The Freshville Solution:

At Freshville, enjoying a sweet treat shouldn't come at the expense of your health. That's why we've created Sugar Fit Tea, a unique blend of natural ingredients carefully selected for their ability to support overall health and well-being without compromising on taste.

The Power of Natural Ingredients:

Our Sugar Fit Tea is crafted from a harmonious blend of natural ingredients sourced from various regions of India, each chosen for its unique health benefits and delicious flavour profile.

Ingredients That Pack a Punch:

Turmeric: Hailing from the sun-kissed fields of Tamil Nadu and Karnataka in South India, turmeric is a golden spice with many health benefits. Its active compound, curcumin, boasts potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, aiding in reducing inflammation, boosting immunity, and supporting digestive health.

Tamarind: Found in the tropical forests of Kerala and Andhra Pradesh in South India, tamarind is a tangy fruit rich in vitamins, minerals, and dietary fibre. It aids digestion, promotes heart health, and may even help regulate blood sugar levels, making it an essential addition to our Sugar Fit Tea.

Karela (Bitter Gourd)Harvested from the fertile plains of Uttar Pradesh and Punjab in North India, karela is a powerhouse of nutrients. Despite its bitter taste, it is revered for its ability to lower blood sugar levels, improve insulin sensitivity, and support weight management, making it a valuable ingredient in our tea blend.

Tulsi (Holy Basil): Revered as the "Queen of Herbs," Tulsi is cultivated in the sacred soils of Uttar Pradesh and Gujarat in North India. It is known for its adaptogenic properties, helping the body cope with stress and promoting overall well-being. Tulsi also exhibits antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties, supporting immune function and aiding respiratory health.

Cinnamon:  Sourced from the spice-rich landscapes of Karnataka and Kerala in South India, cinnamon adds a warm, spicy flavour to our Sugar Fit Tea. Beyond its culinary uses, cinnamon is rich in antioxidants and has been linked to numerous health benefits, including improved blood sugar control, reduced inflammation, and enhanced heart health.

Gurmar (Gymnema Sylvestre): Gurmar, known as the "sugar destroyer," grows abundantly in the forests of Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra in Central India. It has been traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine to help regulate blood sugar levels and curb sugar cravings, making it a valuable addition to our Sugar Fit Tea blend.

Harnessing the Power of Nature:

Each ingredient in our Sugar Fit Tea is meticulously sourced from its native region, ensuring optimal freshness and potency. We believe in the power of nature to nourish and heal, so we take great care in selecting only the finest ingredients for our blends.

The Freshville Difference:

At Freshville, we promote holistic wellness through natural, sustainably sourced ingredients. Our Sugar Fit Tea is free from artificial additives, preservatives, and added sugars, allowing you to enjoy the pure goodness of nature with every sip

Important Considerations:

As with any natural remedy, individual responses may vary. It's crucial to consult with healthcare professionals, especially if you are on medication or have specific health concerns related to diabetes.

In Conclusion:

Freshville Sugar Fit Tea is more than just a beverage; it's a holistic approach to wellness that nourishes your body and delights your senses. With its blend of natural ingredients from different parts of India, our Tea celebrates the country's rich botanical heritage and diverse culinary traditions. So why wait? Start your journey to a healthier, happier you with Freshville Sugar Fit Tea today!

It is Tea. Take a step towards a happier, healthier you!

descriptor.name: Freshville Stamina Booster Herbs | Pure & Natural |Elachi | Mulethi | Cinnamon | Nutmeg | Ashwagandha | Ginseng Root | Gokhru | Tulsi | Shatavari |Green Tea Tin (120gm ,One Month Pack).1 Month Pack
descriptor.short_desc:
The Stamina Booster Herbal Blend is a meticulously curated fusion of potent herbs designed to elevate physical endurance and mental resilience. Crafted with a blend of traditional wisdom and modern science, this herbal concoction offers a holistic approach to boosting stamina and vitality.

At the heart of this blend are adaptogenic herbs, including ginseng, Nutmeg, Gokhru, Shatavari and ashwagandha. These adaptogens have been revered for centuries in traditional medicine for their remarkable ability to enhance the body's adaptive response to stress, bolstering stamina and fortitude over time. Ginseng, in particular, has been hailed for its capacity to increase energy levels and combat fatigue, making it a cornerstone of this revitalizing blend.

Complementing the adaptogens are energizing herbs such as green tea . Rich in antioxidants and naturally occurring caffeine, these botanicals provide a gentle yet sustained energy boost, sharpening focus and banishing lethargy without the crash associated with synthetic stimulants. By harnessing the power of these stimulating herbs, the Stamina Booster Herbal Blend offers a natural alternative to conventional energy drinks, promoting vitality from within.

To enhance both flavor and efficacy, this herbal blend also incorporates ingredients like Cardamom,Cinnamon and licorice. Peppermint not only lends a refreshing taste but also aids digestion, ensuring optimal nutrient absorption and sustained energy release. Meanwhile, licorice adds a subtle sweetness while offering anti-inflammatory properties and supporting adrenal function, further fortifying the body's resilience to stress.
descriptor.long_desc:
The Stamina Booster Herbal Blend is a meticulously curated fusion of potent herbs designed to elevate physical endurance and mental resilience. Crafted with a blend of traditional wisdom and modern science, this herbal concoction offers a holistic approach to boosting stamina and vitality.

At the heart of this blend are adaptogenic herbs, including ginseng, Nutmeg, Gokhru, Shatavari and ashwagandha. These adaptogens have been revered for centuries in traditional medicine for their remarkable ability to enhance the body's adaptive response to stress, bolstering stamina and fortitude over time. Ginseng, in particular, has been hailed for its capacity to increase energy levels and combat fatigue, making it a cornerstone of this revitalizing blend.

Complementing the adaptogens are energizing herbs such as green tea . Rich in antioxidants and naturally occurring caffeine, these botanicals provide a gentle yet sustained energy boost, sharpening focus and banishing lethargy without the crash associated with synthetic stimulants. By harnessing the power of these stimulating herbs, the Stamina Booster Herbal Blend offers a natural alternative to conventional energy drinks, promoting vitality from within.

To enhance both flavor and efficacy, this herbal blend also incorporates ingredients like Cardamom,Cinnamon and licorice. Peppermint not only lends a refreshing taste but also aids digestion, ensuring optimal nutrient absorption and sustained energy release. Meanwhile, licorice adds a subtle sweetness while offering anti-inflammatory properties and supporting adrenal function, further fortifying the body's resilience to stress.

Whether you're an athlete gearing up for a rigorous workout, a busy professional facing a demanding day, or simply seeking an all-natural energy boost, the Stamina Booster Herbal Blend is your ally in the pursuit of peak performance and well-being. With its carefully selected ingredients and time-tested formula, this blend empowers you to tackle life's challenges with renewed vigor and vitality, one sip at a time.

Within this blend lies a careful selection of core ingredients, each meticulously sourced from diverse regions of India, collectively embodying the nation's rich botanical heritage and centuries-old tradition of holistic wellness. From the misty plantations of Kerala in South India emerges Elachi, or Cardamom, a fragrant spice renowned for its exotic aroma and digestive properties. Traveling to the lush tea gardens of Assam and Darjeeling in the North-East, we harvest the finest Green Tea leaves, prized for their antioxidants and energizing properties. These leaves serve as the backbone of the blend, providing a sustained boost of vitality and mental clarity.From the arid plains of Rajasthan in Western India comes Mulethi, also known as Licorice Root, with its sweet flavor and soothing qualities.Cinnamon, with its warm and spicy aroma, is sourced from the spice-rich landscapes of Karnataka and Kerala in South India. Ashwagandha, revered as the "Indian Ginseng," is cultivated in the fertile soils of Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra in Central India. From the sacred soils of Uttar Pradesh and Gujarat in North India springs Tulsi, or Holy Basil, the "Queen of Herbs." Nutmeg, harvested from the lush valleys of Kerala and Tamil Nadu in South India.Imported from the mountainous regions of the North-East, Ginseng Root brings its legendary vitality and stamina-enhancing properties, invigorating the body and mind with each sip. Gokhru, sourced from the warm plains of Rajasthan and Punjab in North-West India.

Together, these carefully selected core ingredients from various parts of India converge to create a blend that not only rejuvenates the body but also celebrates the nation's rich botanical diversity and profound connection to nature. With every sip, one embarks on a sensory journey through India's diverse landscapes, nourishing the body, mind, and soul with the essence of its finest treasures.

Key Ingredients:

Green Tea: Green tea contains caffeine, which is known to provide a temporary energy boost by stimulating the central nervous system. This can help improve alertness and focus, which may indirectly contribute to stamina during physical or mental activities.

Elachi : Known for its aromatic properties, cardamom is also believed to aid digestion and provide relief from acidity.

Mulethi : Mulethi is often used for its sweet flavor and is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties. It may also help soothe sore throats and coughs.

Cinnamon: Cinnamon is known for its distinct flavor and potential health benefits, including its ability to lower blood sugar levels and reduce inflammation.

Nutmeg: Nutmeg is often used for its warm, spicy flavor. It may also have antioxidant properties and could aid in digestion.

 Shatavari: Energy Boost: Shatavari is believed to possess adaptogenic properties, which means it may help the body adapt to stress and promote overall vitality. Including Shatavari in an energy drink could potentially contribute to its energizing effects, helping men feel more alert and focused.Supports Physical Performance: Some studies suggest that Shatavari may have ergogenic properties, meaning it could enhance physical performance and stamina. Men looking to boost their energy levels for workouts or physically demanding activities may find Shatavari beneficial in an energy drink.

Ashwagandha: Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb that is believed to help the body adapt to stress and increase energy levels. It may also improve physical performance and reduce fatigue, potentially enhancing stamina over time.

Ginseng Root: Ginseng is traditionally used to enhance stamina and endurance. It is believed to increase energy levels, reduce fatigue, and improve physical performance, making it a popular ingredient in stamina-boosting supplements.

Gokhru: Gokhru is used in traditional medicine systems as a tonic for vitality and strength. While research on its effects is limited, it is believed to have potential benefits for overall energy levels and stamina.

Tulsi: Tulsi is considered an adaptogen, which means it may help the body cope with stress and fatigue. By supporting the body's stress response mechanisms, Tulsi may indirectly contribute to improved stamina and energy levels.

How to prepare Freshville Stamina Booster leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of herbs leaves inside a sieve/strainer.

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the herbs leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference).

Step 6: Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.

descriptor.short_desc:
Freshville She Wellness Tea: Empowering Women with PCOS/PCOD

In the realm of women's health, conditions like Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) and Polycystic Ovary Disease (PCOD) present unique challenges, often disrupting hormonal balance and causing symptoms such as irregular periods, facial hair growth, and acne. Freshville She Wellness Tea emerges as a holistic solution, carefully crafted with a blend of natural ingredients known for their ability to alleviate these symptoms and restore harmony to the female body.
descriptor.long_desc:
Freshville She Wellness Tea: Empowering Women with PCOS/PCOD

In the realm of women's health, conditions like Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) and Polycystic Ovary Disease (PCOD) present unique challenges, often disrupting hormonal balance and causing symptoms such as irregular periods, facial hair growth, and acne. Freshville She Wellness Tea emerges as a holistic solution, carefully crafted with a blend of natural ingredients known for their ability to alleviate these symptoms and restore harmony to the female body.

The Essence of Empowerment: A Symphony of Ingredients

Freshville She Wellness Tea is a fusion of nature's finest ingredients, each chosen for its specific benefits in addressing the complexities of PCOS/PCOD:

Spearmint: Known for its anti-androgenic properties, spearmint helps reduce excess testosterone levels, thereby minimizing symptoms like hirsutism (excessive facial hair) commonly associated with PCOS/PCOD.

Fenugreek: Rich in phytoestrogens, fenugreek aids in regulating menstrual cycles and may help improve insulin sensitivity, a key factor in managing PCOS symptoms.

Cinnamon: This warming spice not only adds depth to the tea's flavor but also helps stabilize blood sugar levels, potentially reducing insulin resistance and supporting weight management in PCOS/PCOD.

Fennel: With its estrogenic properties, fennel supports hormonal balance and may help alleviate menstrual irregularities and bloating associated with PCOS/PCOD.

Tulsi (Holy Basil): As an adaptogenic herb, tulsi helps the body adapt to stress, which is often elevated in individuals with PCOS/PCOD. Additionally, it supports hormone regulation and promotes overall wellbeing.

Lodhra: Traditionally used in Ayurveda to support female reproductive health, lodhra may help regulate menstrual cycles and reduce symptoms like acne and facial hair growth.

Ashoka: Another Ayurvedic herb renowned for its benefits to women's health, ashoka may help alleviate menstrual discomfort and promote hormonal balance.

Green Tea: Packed with antioxidants, green tea supports overall health and may aid in weight management, which is often a concern for individuals with PCOS/PCOD.

Nourish, Restore, Empower: Benefits for Women with PCOS/PCOD

Freshville She Wellness Tea offers a multitude of benefits tailored to address the unique challenges faced by women with PCOS/PCOD:

Hormonal Balance: The blend of spearmint, fenugreek, cinnamon, fennel, tulsi, lodhra, and ashoka works synergistically to regulate hormone levels, alleviating symptoms such as irregular periods, hirsutism, and acne.

Menstrual Regularity: Fenugreek, fennel, lodhra, and ashoka support menstrual regularity, helping to establish more predictable cycles and reduce the risk of complications associated with irregular menstruation.

Facial Hair Reduction: Spearmint's anti-androgenic properties may help reduce excess facial hair growth, providing relief from a common symptom of PCOS/PCOD and boosting confidence.

Acne Management: The hormone-balancing effects of the tea's ingredients, combined with their anti-inflammatory properties, may help improve acne symptoms often experienced by individuals with PCOS/PCOD.

<Stress Relief: Tulsi's adaptogenic properties help the body cope with stress, promoting a sense of calm and wellbeing amidst the challenges of managing PCOS/PCOD.

Weight Management: Cinnamon and green tea support healthy metabolism and may aid in weight management, an important aspect of PCOS/PCOD management due to its association with insulin resistance.

Embrace Your Wellness Journey: The Freshville Way

Freshville She Wellness Tea embodies a holistic approach to women's health, empowering individuals with PCOS/PCOD to take control of their wellbeing and thrive despite the challenges they may face. Each sip is a reminder of the body's resilience and the power of natural remedies to restore balance and vitality.

The Freshville Promise: Quality You Can Trust, Results You Can Feel

Crafted with care and commitment to quality, Freshville She Wellness Tea is a testament to our dedication to women's health and empowerment. We prioritize integrity in sourcing the finest ingredients and uphold the highest standards to deliver a product that not only delights the palate but also nourishes the body and uplifts the spirit.

Join the Freshville Community: A Journey of Empowerment

As you embark on your wellness journey with Freshville She Wellness Tea, you become part of a supportive community of individuals empowering each other to overcome the challenges of PCOS/PCOD and embrace a life of vitality and wellbeing.

Conclusion: Empower Your Wellness with Freshville She Wellness Tea

In the face of PCOS/PCOD, Freshville She Wellness Tea offers a beacon of hope and empowerment, providing natural relief from symptoms and supporting women in reclaiming control over their health and happiness. With each sip, women are reminded of their inherent strength and resilience, and empowered to embrace their wellness journey with grace and confidence.

*For best results drink Freshville She Wellness Tea 2 to 3 times a day with your regular medications for at least three months.

Features

Natural: Freshville She Wellness  Tea is made with natural ingredients, making it a safe and healthy way to help with irregular menstrual cycles.

Scientifically Tested: This tea has been scientifically tested to ensure its effectiveness.

Herbal Blend: The herbal blend of Ginger, Fenugreek, Spearmint, Cinnamon, Fennel, Tulsi, Lodhra, and Ashoka make this tea a powerful solution for PCOS & PCOD issues.

Hormonal balance: This tea helps in balancing hormones and regulating menstrual cycles.

Specifications:

- Caffeine-free

- 100% natural ingredients

- Scientifically tested

How to prepare Freshville She Wellness Tea Tea with tea leaves?

Step 1: Take 1tbsp of tea leaves inside a sieve/strainer

Step 2: Place the strainer/sieve over the cup.

Step 3: Add approx. 200ml or 1 cup of freshly boiled water in the cup.

Step 4: Allow the tea leaves to steep for 2-3 minutes.

Step 5: Keep the sieve aside. Add 2 tsp of jaggery syrup/honey as per your preference to it. (As per your preference).

Step 6: Stir and Voila! Your perfect cup of tea is ready. Now enjoy every sip.
